title: After 13 years, Amnesia: The Dark Descent has gotten Steam Workshop support out of nowhere

title: Beloved Twitch streamer Puppers dies at 32
description: "Puppers was, and always will be, one of the brightest lights in The Fog," wrote Dead by Daylight developer Behaviour Interactive.
